title: Police: Man mishandles handgun, accidentally shoots himself in leg at Colorado Springs 7-Eleven
content:
A man mishandled a handgun and accidentally shot himself in the leg in the parking lot of a Colorado Springs 7-Eleven on Sunday afternoon, police said.
Reports came in just after 3 p.m. that a man suffered a self-inflicted gunshot wound at the convenient store on the 2900 block of East Fountain Boulevard, police said. The man left the scene before the arrival of officers and went to a local hospital.
The unidentified man was not arrested after police said the shooting was accidental.
No other details were released.
